languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс сдержанно улыбается.{/n} "Мне хотелось бы на это рассчитывать, {name}. Что ж, тяжелый день подошел к концу, и мне пора оставить Вольного Торговца, чтобы новоиспеченная глава протектората могла выспаться. Доброй ночи, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс сдержанно улыбается.{/n} "Мне хотелось бы на это рассчитывать, {name}. Что ж, тяжелый день подошел к концу, и мне пора оставить Вольного Торговца, чтобы новоиспеченная глава протектората могла выспаться. Доброй ночи, {name}".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс сдержанно улыбается.{/n} "Мне хотелось бы на это рассчитывать, {name}. Что ж, тяжелый день подошел к концу, и мне пора оставить Вольного Торговца, чтобы новоиспеченная глава протектората могла выспаться. Доброй ночи, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."

{n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."

{n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."

{n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."

languages.text: {n}海因里希对你露出了克制的微笑。{/n}“希望如此，{name}。是啊，这艰难的一天终于结束了，我也是时候向行商浪人告别了。王朝的新领袖该好好休息休息了。晚安，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希对你露出了克制的微笑。{/n}“希望如此，{name}。是啊，这艰难的一天终于结束了，我也是时候向行商浪人告别了。王朝的新领袖该好好休息休息了。晚安，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te ofrece una sonrisa contenida.{/n} «Eso espero, {name}. Bueno, este difícil día llega a su fin, así que me despido de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para que {mf|el|la} recién nombrad{mf|o|a} líder del protectorado pueda dormir un poco. Buenas noches, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te ofrece una sonrisa contenida.{/n} «Eso espero, {name}. Bueno, este difícil día llega a su fin, así que me despido de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para que {mf|el|la} recién nombrad{mf|o|a} líder del protectorado pueda dormir un poco. Buenas noches, {name}».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは引きつった笑顔を浮かべる。{/n}「そうしたいと思うよ、{name}。さて、大変な一日も終わりそうだ。新たに徴兵された保護領の領主様がそこそこ寝られるよう、我は自由開拓者の下を去る時間だ。お休み、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは引きつった笑顔を浮かべる。{/n}「そうしたいと思うよ、{name}。さて、大変な一日も終わりそうだ。新たに徴兵された保護領の領主様がそこそこ寝られるよう、我は自由開拓者の下を去る時間だ。お休み、{name}」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lächelt zurückhaltend.{/n} "Das hoffe ich, {name}. Nun, dieser schwere Tag ist zu Ende, und ich verabschiede mich {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin}, damit die neue Führung des Protektorats ein wenig schlafen kann. Gute Nacht, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lächelt zurückhaltend.{/n} "Das hoffe ich, {name}. Nun, dieser schwere Tag ist zu Ende, und ich verabschiede mich {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin}, damit die neue Führung des Protektorats ein wenig schlafen kann. Gute Nacht, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous adresse un sourire contenu.{/n} « Je l'espère. Bien, cette journée touche à sa fin et il est temps pour moi de prendre congé {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} pour que {mf|le nouveau souverain|la nouvelle souveraine} du protectorat puisse se reposer. Bonne nuit, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous adresse un sourire contenu.{/n} « Je l'espère. Bien, cette journée touche à sa fin et il est temps pour moi de prendre congé {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} pour que {mf|le nouveau souverain|la nouvelle souveraine} du protectorat puisse se reposer. Bonne nuit, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, ölçülü bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Umarım geçer {name}. Neyse, zorlu bir günün daha sonuna geldik. Artık Hür Tacir'in yanından ayrılmamın ve protektoranın yeni liderinin güzel bir uyku çekmesinin zamanı geldi. İyi geceler {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix offers a restrained smile.{/n} "I hope it does, {name}. Well, this difficult day has come to an end, and it is time for me to take my leave of the Rogue Trader so that the newly inducted head of the protectorate can get some sleep. Good night, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ölçülü bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Umarım öyle olur {name}. Eh, neyse, zorlu bir günün daha sonuna geldik ve artık Hür Tacir'in yanından ayrılmamın ve protektoranın yeni liderinin güzel bir uyku çekmesinin zamanı geldi. İyi geceler {name}."
